snippet: Debut albums by Thiefs, Shamie Royston and Curtis Hasselbring stretch across the jazz spectrum. And a new release by singer-songwriter Terry Allen is a return of a master lyricist.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews debut albums from Thiefs, Shamie Royston and Curtis Hasselbring; also reviews new release by singer-songwriter Terry Allen.
lead_paragraph: Debut albums by Thiefs, Shamie Royston and Curtis Hasselbring stretch across the jazz spectrum. And a new release by singer-songwriter Terry Allen is a return of a master lyricist.

headline.seo: Jazz From Thiefs, Shamie Royston and Curtis Hasselbring
headline.main: New Jazz Vocabularies, a Bit of Elegance and Big Ideas
headline.print_headline: New Jazz Vocabularies, a Bit of Elegance and Big Ideas
